info.name: Contract Service - Postman Test Suite
info.description:
## Postman Collection Steps

- Setup the environment variables like base_url and auth_token.
- Now first create a Estimate by using estimate/_create api.
- To create contract its Estimate should be in accepted state.
- Now after creating the estimate put required details in the contract create request body.
- Now the contract should be in accepted state to create an revision contract.
- To accept the contract you need to login as a cbo user.
- Now after contract gets accepted create the revision estimate to create revision contract.
- After creation of revised estimate we can create the revision contract.
